reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is very knowledgeable and explains complex concepts well. Sometimes her assignments can be challenging, but overall a great instructor.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Fantastic lecturer! Prof. Johnson makes history come alive with his engaging storytelling and in-depth knowledge.

reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson knows her subject well, but her lectures can be dry. More interactive elements would improve the class.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is patient and always willing to help. His problem-solving approach is very effective.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Green is passionate about psychology and it shows. Her classes are always thought-provoking and engaging.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown seems disinterested in teaching. Often arrives late and rushes through material.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Wang's lab sessions are well-organized and informative. Her lectures could use more real-world examples.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson's passion for literature is contagious. His analysis of texts is insightful and inspiring.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia presents interesting topics, but her grading can be inconsistent. More clarity on expectations would be helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Anderson explains complex theories clearly. His problem sets are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are like guided tours through art museums. Her enthusiasm for the subject is infectious.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Prof. Nguyen knows his subject well, but sometimes struggles to engage the class. More discussions would improve the course.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez incorporates current events into her lectures effectively. Her field trips are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Smith's Socratic method of teaching encourages critical thinking. His classes are always intellectually stimulating.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Turner's lectures are often disorganized and hard to follow. More structure would greatly improve the course.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Kim brings real-world experience to the classroom. His case studies are particularly insightful.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Parker makes language study fascinating. Her interactive teaching style helps concepts stick.

reviews.subject: Mechanical Engineering
reviews.review: Prof. Davis is knowledgeable but can be intimidating. His office hours are more helpful than his lectures.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez explains complex brain functions clearly. Her enthusiasm for the subject is evident in every lecture.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. White's classes are a perfect blend of theory and practice. His passion for music is truly inspiring.
